00037 #include "ring_topo.h"
00038 
00039 void RingTopology :: setNeighbors (Cooperative * __mig,
00040                                    std :: vector <Cooperative *> & __from,
00041                                    std :: vector <Cooperative *> & __to)
00042 {
00043   __from.clear () ;
00044   __to.clear () ;
00045 
00046   int len = mig.size () ;
00047 
00048   for (int i = 0 ; i < len ; i ++)
00049     if (mig [i] == __mig)
00050       {
00051         __from.push_back (mig [(i - 1 + len) % len]) ;
00052         __to.push_back (mig [(i + 1) % len]) ;
00053         break;
00054       }
00055 }
